item.title: Delta :O
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

xray55:

When I do the whip special both the bandos godsword spec and whip spec go off but the bandos spec comes after the whip spec. If that makes since.

Is seems like the your whip spec is using both gfxs…
like its using

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 1658); stillgfx(341, EnemyY, EnemyX); }
but at the same time somewhere else its using the bandos spec gfx

Read full topic

item.title: Delta :O
item.dc:creator: @xray55 xray55
item.description:
@xray55 wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(false, 50, 600, 1658);
stillgfx(341, EnemyY, EnemyX);
}

This is the whip special but when I accually do the special the spiral thing works but 2 second’s later the bandos spec goes off too. Any help?
